name: Drake of the 99 Dragons
description: The 99 Dragons Clan has been murdered. Even worse, the ancient artifact they guard, stolen. With its power, one can trap the souls of the living and resurrect those who have crossed over.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: Pentium 3 @ 600 MHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
